title: Customized Language Education Design Through Cognitive Style and Learning Preference Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience performing fundamental workplace tasks
context.additional_context: Strengthened smartphone-based learning activities, practical application evaluation through project collaboration.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify their cognitive style (holistic/analytical, verbal/visual) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can select language learning methods (collaborative activities/individual study, text/multimedia) based on preferences with over 70% accuracy.
Learners can apply communication strategies aligned with their cognitive style three or more times through project-based assessments and submit outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
